questions: All the trees in the park are flowering trees.
Some of the trees in the park are dogwoods.
All dogwoods in the park are flowering trees.
If the first two statements are true, the third statement is
Two students appeared at an examination. One of them secured 9 marks more than the other and his marks was 56% of the sum of their marks. The marks obtained by them are:
What percentage of numbers from 1 to 70 have 1 or 9 in the unit's digit?
If A = x% of y and B = y% of x, then which of the following is true?
options: A. A is smaller than B.
B. A is greater than B
C. Relationship between A and B cannot be determined.
D. If x is smaller than y, then A is greater than B.

questions: Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series;
In the series 2, 6, 18, 54, ...... what will be the 8th term ?
If A is the brother of B; B is the sister of C; and C is the father of D, how D is related to A?
How many cubes having red, green and black colours on at least one side of the cube will be formed ?
A, P, R, X, S and Z are sitting in a row. S and Z are in the centre. A and P are at the ends. R is sitting to the left of A. Who is to the right of P ?
Find the greatest number that will divide 43, 91 and 183 so as to leave the same remainder in each case
